Instructions: 1. Navigate to 'Order Inquiry'. 2. Verify 'Payment Terms' matches 'Proforma'. 3. Cross-reference bank receipt against Unity 'Total Amount'. 4. Update 'Collection Status' to 'Funds Confirmed'.
1. Open SFDC Case. 2. Change 'Case Record Type' to 'Global Support Escalation'. 3. Tag the Regional Lead in the 'Internal Comments'. 4. Attach all email threads as a single PDF for audit trail.
1. Access the 'Venlo Dashboard' via ECCDVXXX. 2. Filter by 'Awaiting Export'. 3. If tracking is missing, initiate 'Carrier Search' in IMS. 4. Manually update Case with tracking ID once generated.

1. Check 'Header Alerts' for 'Report in Process'. 2. Verify if 'Good Party' check is required. 3. DO NOT expedite via OMT; wait for automated release (standard 4-hour window). 4. Advise customer of compliance hold.
1. Initiate RMA in Oracle ERP. 2. Select 'Reason Code' (Defective/Wrong Part). 3. Generate 'Return Label' through Logistics tab. 4. Link Oracle RMA ID to the Salesforce Parent Case.
1. Enter 'Digital Customer Maintenance'. 2. Identify 'Duplicate Logins'. 3. Select 'Master Profile'. 4. Deactivate secondary access. 5. Trigger 'Portal Invite' to the primary corporate email.
